channel.title: Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Git Command
item.description: 微软雅黑 1. 初始化git 1 2 3 4 5 6 #在当前目录下新建一个git代码库 $ git init #clone项目 $ git clone [url] 2.配置 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 #显示当前的gi

item.title: Hugo deploy static site
item.description: 1.Install hugo 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 $ export HUGO_VERSION=0.70.0 $ wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v${HUGO_VERSION}/hugo_${HUGO_VERSION}_Linux-64bit.tar.gz $ tar -zxvf hugo_${HUGO_VERSION}_Linux-64bit.tar.gz $ chmod +x hugo $ cp hugo /usr/local/bin 2.Create site 1 $ hugo new site blog blog目录结构: ├── archetypes #网站内容类型 ├── config.toml #网站主配置文件 ├
